title: Upgrading a cluster with DataStax Mission Control
description:
In this video, Aaron Ploetz shows you how easy it is to upgrade an Apache Cassandra® cluster with DataStax Mission Control.

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs... 
Twitter:  

 / datastaxdevs  

About DataStax Developers:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
